import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function PostCreate({ createPost, currentUser }) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: "", body: "", author: currentUser.username, thumbnail: "" }); const { title, body, thumbnail } = formData; console.log(formData) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value, })); } console.log(formData) return (
{ e.preventDefault() createPost(formData); }}>
